title: Senior Accountant - Human-Sized Firm near the Belgian Border (Part-Time)
description:
Senior Accountant - Human-Sized Firm near the Belgian Border (Part-Time)



Dear Senior Accountants, I'm pleased to share that one of our partners is currently seeking a Senior Accountant to join their firm on a part-time basis. This opportunity arises from the growth they've been experiencing in their client portfolio and their commitment to maintaining an excellent work-life balance for all their employees.

Our partner has been established near the Belgian border in Luxembourg for over 20 years, steadily building a strong client base, primarily made up of commercial structures. They offer a wide range of services including accounting, tax, and more.

Joining this firm means entering an environment that offers great flexibility, along with the opportunity to develop your skills by working with interesting and complex clients, without the long hours typically associated with larger firms.

Our partner is deeply committed to delivering high-quality services to their clients and to providing daily support to their team, helping them grow professionally in a healthy and supportive environment.

If you're looking for a part-time opportunity that allows you to enhance your quality of life while continuing to develop your professional skills, please don't hesitate to send us your profile.



Your Responsibilities | Accountancy - Commercial - Tax - Part-time

   
   
 * You will be responsible for accurately preparing all required financial statements.
 * Our partner expects you to prepare all tax and VAT returns related to your client portfolio.
 * You should ensure smooth communication with your clients, maintaining a strong client relationship by responding to their queries and providing advice on their accounts when needed.
 * It is important for our partner that you respect all deadlines for submitting the required documentation, in order to avoid any penalties for your clients.
 * You should also maintain regular communication with external providers, such as auditors and banks, to ensure proper corporate governance.
   
   


Profile and Career Path | Accountancy - Commercial - Tax - Part-time

   
   
 * You have at least 3 years of experience as an Accountant in Luxembourg, ideally within a fiduciary, PSF, or Big Four firm.
 * Previous experience managing a commercial client portfolio in Luxembourg is required.
 * Fluency in French and a professional level of English are mandatory, due to the linguistic diversity within our partner's client portfolio.
 * You should hold a degree in Accounting or a related field.
 * Previous experience preparing tax and VAT returns for your client portfolio in Luxembourg is essential.
   
   


Offer | Accountancy - Commercial - Tax - Part-time

   
   
 * For this role, our partner is prepared to offer a gross annual salary of up to €60,000 (on a full-time basis), depending on your experience and expertise.
 * You will have the flexibility to manage your own schedule within business hours, ensuring an efficient and smooth handling of your client portfolio.
 * Our partner offers the opportunity to work on a part-time basis, which can be adjusted based on your availability and the firm's needs.
 * Benefit from valuable exposure by working in a human-sized firm, allowing you to maintain direct contact with your client base.
 * Enjoy an excellent work-life balance, as overtime is not required, unlike in many larger firms.
   
   


Abiomis is a boutique recruitment & advisory agency specialized in the Financial and Legal fields in Luxembourg and Belgium, offering entry level to executive management positions all over the country.

At Abiomis, we value what matters most to you. We know listening is key and, in doing so, this allows us to determine together which opportunities could suit you and your criteria best. Whether you are a candidate or company, we are here every step of the way and it will be our pleasure to assist you in your evolution.

Contact us today at +352 26 38 38 50 to discuss your next career move or have a look at our current vacancies on www.abiomis.com .
